note.p: Death: Southhold Bay, Suffolk, England, Europe (13 June 1665)
Career: MP for County Cork (1661); Naval volunteer against the Dutch; killed in action at the Battle of Lowestoft

Notes: The election date is Boyle's election date into the Society after the grant of the second charter in April 1663. All Fellows admitted in a two-month window after this charter, until 22 June 1663, are considered Original Fellows.
Southhold Bay likely means Southwold Bay.
